metadata.description: Initial baseline questions for Formul8 multiagent system

questions.question: What are the benefits of cannabis?
questions.expected_answer: Cannabis has various therapeutic benefits including pain relief, anxiety reduction, anti-inflammatory properties.

questions.question: How do I scale up my cannabis production?
questions.expected_answer: Scaling cannabis production involves expanding cultivation capacity, optimizing processes, and maintaining quality control.

questions.question: What are the compliance requirements for cannabis businesses in California?
questions.expected_answer: California cannabis businesses must comply with state licensing, testing, tracking, and security requirements.

questions.question: How do I calculate THC dosage?
questions.expected_answer: THC dosage calculation involves determining concentration and calculating amount per serving.

questions.question: What is THC?
questions.expected_answer: THC (tetrahydrocannabinol) is the primary psychoactive compound in cannabis.
